# supabase Provider

Supabase API: Supabase API

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    supabase = {
      source  = "speakeasy/supabase"
      version = "0.0.6"
    }
  }
}

provider "supabase" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

### Optional

- `bearer` (String, Sensitive)
